name: The Himalayan Trek
summary: Adventurous trek through the Himalayas in Himachal Pradesh
description: Explore snow-capped peaks, lush valleys, and high-altitude passes in one of the most thrilling treks of India. Experience scenic beauty, traditional mountain villages, and pure air.

name: Rajasthan Royal Tour
summary: Explore the regal cities of Jaipur, Jodhpur, and Udaipur
description: Palaces, forts, colorful bazaars, camel rides and desert nights — immerse yourself in the royal history and culture of Rajasthan.

name: Goa Beach Escape
summary: Sun, sand and sea in Goa's stunning coastal paradise
description: Relax on serene beaches, explore Portuguese architecture, and party under the stars in the most vibrant coastal state of India.

name: Kerala Backwaters
summary: Houseboat tour through the scenic backwaters of Kerala
description: Cruise through tranquil waters, watch lush landscapes and enjoy traditional Kerala cuisine in this relaxing experience.

name: Kashmir Paradise Tour
summary: Discover the beauty of Srinagar, Gulmarg, and Pahalgam
description: Shikara rides, snow adventures and breathtaking landscapes make Kashmir a must-see destination.

name: Spiritual South India
summary: Temple hopping across Tamil Nadu and Pondicherry
description: Visit ancient temples, experience spiritual rituals, and enjoy serene beaches on this heritage-filled trip.

name: North East Explorer
summary: Wildlife, hills, and culture across Meghalaya and Assam
description: Visit living root bridges, lush waterfalls, and tea plantations on this unique exploration of India’s northeast.

name: Varanasi & Ganges Tour
summary: The spiritual heart of India on the banks of the Ganges
description: Witness the Ganga Aarti, explore ancient temples, and take a boat ride along the sacred river.

name: Andaman Island Adventure
summary: Snorkeling, diving and beach fun in the Andaman Islands
description: Pristine blue waters, coral reefs and island vibes make this tropical tour unforgettable.

name: Sundarbans Safari
summary: Tiger-spotting and boat rides in India's largest delta
description: Venture deep into the mangrove forests and watch for rare wildlife including the Royal Bengal Tiger.

name: Golden Triangle Tour
summary: Delhi, Agra, and Jaipur in one power-packed journey
description: From the Taj Mahal to Rajput forts and bustling markets, this classic tour introduces India in a nutshell.

name: Wildlife of Madhya Pradesh
summary: Kanha and Bandhavgarh National Parks in one trip
description: Go tiger spotting in some of India’s most famous reserves. A must for wildlife lovers.

name: Leh–Ladakh Road Trip
summary: A high-altitude road adventure across Ladakh
description: Ride through mountains, monasteries, and high passes like Khardung La and Nubra Valley.

name: Rann of Kutch Festival Tour
summary: Enjoy culture, art, music and dance in white desert
description: Stay in tent cities, witness traditional crafts and experience a cultural extravaganza in Gujarat’s salt desert.

name: Mumbai City Life
summary: A fast-paced tour of India’s financial capital
description: From Bollywood studios to colonial architecture and street food — Mumbai has it all.
